name: Rebirth Fantasy Online
description:
Introduction
Rebirth Fantasy is an open world Free 2D Online RPG, Explore a world of fantasy where slimes, goblins and dragons exist. Play the way you like, create skills, craft items, fight different monsters and explore anywhere without being blocked on a story progression! Play a unique Old School Retro Game in a concept of "Another World" fantasy stories.

Develop a story where you can play the role as a Hero and defeat the Demon Lord, You might even get your own Statue added on the Kingdom

Story
A soul was lost on the world of void, and a certain Goddess found this poor soul. The Goddess save this soul and give it life on her world, and you will play the role as that soul. You are free to be what you want. Be a strong warrior, wise magician, skilled hunter, a fisher or even a bug catcher. Explore dungeons, find hidden place, collect materials and craft them to create different kind of potions, armors and weapons.

There is no main story line that will bind you to your life here on another world, you can play the role as a Demon Lord or be the Hero who will slay the one who plays the role of a Demon King
